name: sucex

body.origin:
|- wcel(csuc(c0), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(csuc(c0), universe))
body.pretty:
⊢ suc(c0)∈ 𝕌
⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
⊣ (c0 ∈ 𝕌 → suc(c0)∈ 𝕌)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(csuc(c0), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(csuc(c0), universe))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ suc(c0)∈ 𝕌
⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
⊣ (c0 ∈ 𝕌 → suc(c0)∈ 𝕌)

comment: The successor of a set is a set. (Contributed by NM, 30-Aug-1993.)
